revised_title: Isolation and Cultivation of Mycobacterium enteritidis Chronicæ Pseudotuberculosæ bovis and Preparation of a Diagnostic Vaccine
tldr: The authors successfully isolate and cultivate the Mycobacterium enteritidis chronicæ pseudotuberculosæ bovis, a bacterium responsible for pseudo-tuberculous enteritis in bovines, and explore the development of a diagnostic vaccine for the disease.
